content: Are there any libraries available to render /questionnaire resources in a browser?
There was an XSLT transform but it hasn't been maintained and was pretty crude. I'm not aware of any others. @Grahame Grieve @Brian Postlethwaite ?
I have some code in my server in pascal. But it's integrated into what my server does (custom services to populate choices from expansions, text search... nothing big, but still custom)
Ours is dstu2 and not open source.
Hi @Tim Berezny, at the last HL7 WGM in New Orleans, I saw a presentation from NIH about a dynamic FHIR forms engine, seemed pretty powerful: https://lhc-forms.lhc.nlm.nih.gov/
